languages.text: {n}Крохотное метательное лезвие незаметно вылетает из моей ладони и чертит алую черту на шее Наковальни. Если бы я хотела — она бы умерла. Но она продолжает дышать и обливаться кровью. И яростно кричать, ища взглядом меня.{/n} "Убийцы Вольного Торговца уже здесь! Смотрите! Они хотели убить меня! Лови убийц!" {n}Искра высечена.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
PDSparkWoman_name
Кибелла делает жест типа броска, PDSparkWoman_name корчится от боли

PDSparkWoman_name
Кибелла делает жест типа броска, PDSparkWoman_name корчится от боли

languages.text: {n}A small throwing blade flies out of my palm and draws a scarlet line across Anvil's neck. If I had wished it, she would be dead. But she continues to breathe and to bleed. And to scream furiously as she looks for me.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's assassins are here! Look! They wanted to kill me! Find the assassins!" {n}The spark is lit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Крохотное метательное лезвие незаметно вылетает из моей ладони и чертит алую черту на шее Наковальни. Если бы я хотела — она бы умерла. Но она продолжает дышать и обливаться кровью. И яростно кричать, ища взглядом меня.{/n} "Убийцы Вольного Торговца уже здесь! Смотрите! Они хотели убить меня! Лови убийц!" {n}Искра высечена.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A tiny throwing blade flies out of my palm and draws a scarlet line across Anvil's neck. If I wanted to, she would be dead. But she continues to breathe and to bleed. And to scream furiously, looking for me.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's assassins are here! Look! They wanted to kill me! Get the assassins!" {n}The spark is lit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine kleine Wurfklinge fliegt aus meiner Hand und zieht eine rote Linie quer über Amboss' Kehle. Hätte ich es gewünscht, wäre sie tot. Doch sie atmet weiter und blutet weiter. Und schreit weiter zornig, während sie nach mir sucht:{/n} "Die Assassinen {rt_mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sind hier! Seht! Sie wollten mich töten! Findet die Assassinen!" {n}Der Funke ist entzündet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A small throwing blade flies out of my palm and draws a scarlet line across Anvil's neck. If I had wished it, she would be dead. But she continues to breathe and to bleed. And to scream furiously as she looks for me.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's assassins are here! Look! They wanted to kill me! Find the assassins!" {n}The spark is lit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine kleine Wurfklinge fliegt aus meiner Hand und zieht eine rote Linie quer über Amboss' Kehle. Hätte ich es gewünscht, wäre sie tot. Doch sie atmet weiter und blutet weiter. Und schreit weiter zornig, während sie nach mir sucht:{/n} "Die Assassinen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sind hier! Seht! Sie wollten mich töten! Findet die Assassinen!" {n}Der Funke ist entzündet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una pequeña daga arrojadiza vuela de mi mano para dibujar una línea escarlata en el cuello de Yunque. De haberlo querido, estaría muerta. Pero continúa respirando y sangrando, gritando con furia mientras me busca.{/n} «¡Los asesinos de{rt_mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente están aquí! ¡Mirad! ¡Querían matarme! ¡Encontrad a los asesinos!». {n}La chispa ha prendido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A small throwing blade flies out of my palm and draws a scarlet line across Anvil's neck. If I had wished it, she would be dead. But she continues to breathe and to bleed. And to scream furiously as she looks for me.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's assassins are here! Look! They wanted to kill me! Find the assassins!" {n}The spark is lit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una pequeña daga arrojadiza vuela de mi mano para dibujar una línea escarlata en el cuello de Yunque. De haberlo querido, estaría muerta. Pero continúa respirando y sangrando, gritando con furia mientras me busca.{/n} «¡Los asesinos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente están aquí! ¡Mirad! ¡Querían matarme! ¡Encontrad a los asesinos!». {n}La chispa ha prendido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}手から小型の投げナイフを飛ばせば、金床の首に赤色の線が走る。私にその気があれば、彼女は死んでいただろう。しかし彼女は呼吸しており、血を流し続けている。そして俺を探しながら激しく叫んでいる。{/n}「ローグトレーダーのアサシンがいる！見て！奴らは私を殺そうとしたわ！アサシンを見つけて！」{n}火花が灯された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A small throwing blade flies out of my palm and draws a scarlet line across Anvil's neck. If I had wished it, she would be dead. But she continues to breathe and to bleed. And to scream furiously as she looks for me.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's assassins are here! Look! They wanted to kill me! Find the assassins!" {n}The spark is lit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}手から小型の投げナイフを飛ばせば、金床の首に赤色の線が走る。私にその気があれば、彼女は死んでいただろう。しかし彼女は呼吸しており、血を流し続けている。そして俺を探しながら激しく叫んでいる。{/n}「ローグトレーダーのアサシンがいる！見て！奴らは私を殺そうとしたわ！アサシンを見つけて！」{n}火花が灯された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我掷出了一把小小的飞刀，在“铁砧”的脖子上割出了一道殷红的细线。如果我想要她的命，她早就死了，但此刻，她依然在呼吸，在流血。她发出了暴怒的尖叫声，试图找到我。{/n}“行商浪人的刺客就在这里！看啊！他们打算要我的命！把那些刺客揪出来！”{n}火花被点燃了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A small throwing blade flies out of my palm and draws a scarlet line across Anvil's neck. If I had wished it, she would be dead. But she continues to breathe and to bleed. And to scream furiously as she looks for me.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's assassins are here! Look! They wanted to kill me! Find the assassins!" {n}The spark is lit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我掷出了一把小小的飞刀，在“铁砧”的脖子上割出了一道殷红的细线。如果我想要她的命，她早就死了，但此刻，她依然在呼吸，在流血。她发出了暴怒的尖叫声，试图找到我。{/n}“行商浪人的刺客就在这里！看啊！他们打算要我的命！把那些刺客揪出来！”{n}火花被点燃了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une courte lame apparaît dans ma paume et vient tracer une ligne écarlate sur la gorge d'Enclume. Si je l'avais voulu, elle serait morte, mais je l'autorise à continuer à respirer. Elle me cherche du regard tandis que le sang commence à couler, puis soudain, elle se met à hurler.{/n} « Les assassins {rt_mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sont ici ! Regardez ! Ils ont essayé de me tuer ! Trouvez les assassins ! » {n}L'étincelle est allumée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A small throwing blade flies out of my palm and draws a scarlet line across Anvil's neck. If I had wished it, she would be dead. But she continues to breathe and to bleed. And to scream furiously as she looks for me.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's assassins are here! Look! They wanted to kill me! Find the assassins!" {n}The spark is lit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une courte lame apparaît dans ma paume et vient tracer une ligne écarlate sur la gorge d'Enclume. Si je l'avais voulu, elle serait morte, mais je l'autorise à continuer à respirer. Elle me cherche du regard tandis que le sang commence à couler, puis soudain, elle se met à hurler.{/n} « Les assassins {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sont ici ! Regardez ! Ils ont essayé de me tuer ! Trouvez les assassins ! » {n}L'étincelle est allumée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ufak bir fırlatma bıçağı, avcumdan uçup giderek Örs'ün boynunda başta sona kızıl bir çizgi çiziyor. İsteseydim canını alırdım. Yine de nefes alıp kan akıtmaya ve beni ararken öfkeyle çığlık atmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in suikastçıları burada! Bakın! Beni öldürmek istediler! Suikastçıları bulun!" {n}Kıvılcım çakıldı.{/n}

And to scream furiously as she looks for me.{/n} "The Rogue Trader's assassins are here! Look! They wanted to kill me! Find the assassins!" {n}The spark is lit.{/n}
